name: 3 Minute Walk
storyline:
What was a 3 minute walk from the apartment door to the car like for a person with health anxiety during the height of the COVID-19 pandemic? How does the transition from one safe space to another feel when that transition takes place through a highly unsafe one?

This project was an attempt to put into a game the feelings that likely many people experienced in this time. It is a work of compassion, and empathy, and hopefully will allow others to feel seen or to understand what some of us went through.
summary: 3 Minute Walk is a COVID-19 anxiety simulator.
